resources.string: Congratulations \n If you got here you are awesome! \n I hope you learned a lot from this game.
To restart the game go to Memory Game Menu \"Option\" and restart the challenge.
To restart the game go to Hangman\'s Game Menu \"Option\" and restart the challenge.
You have conquered all levels, now you can train by choosing the level.
To restart the game go to Words Game Menu \"Option\" and restart the challenge.

The Word Game is a game in which you must correctly fill in the right side with the words corresponding to the other proposed language of the game. 
 
Goal 
 The goal of the game is to learn new words. 
 
Time 
 The best time will be saved, and you can reset the Words Game time. 
 
Sounds of words 
 If you click on the highlighted word, you will hear the sound of the word in the other language, if game audio is off, audio will not work. 
 
Level 
 Each language has 138 levels, separated into subject categories, you can reset the levels at any time, the 138 levels are loaded randomly. 
 
Progress 
 Each language has it own progress, if you change language the progress corresponding to the language will be loaded.

The Word Random Game is a game in which you must correctly fill in the right side with the words corresponding to the other proposed language of the game. 
 
Goal 
 The goal of the game is to learn new words. 
 
Time 
 The best time will be saved, and you can reset the Words Random Game time. 
 
Sounds of words 
 If you click on the highlighted word, you will hear the sound of the word in the other language, if game audio is off, audio will not work. 
 
Level 
 Each language has 138 levels, separated into subject categories, you can reset the levels at any time, the 138 levels are loaded randomly. 
 
Progress 
 Each language has it own progress, there are infinite levels, that can be repeated, if you change language the progress corresponding to the language will be loaded.

Hangman is a game in which the player has to guess what the proposed word is, having as its tip the theme linked to the word. 
 With each wrong letter a part of the doll, if you reach the amount of possible errors, you lose and have to restart the level. 
 
Goal 
 The objective of the game is to hit the word before finishing the doll's body parts. 
 
Time 
 There is no time stamp. 
 
Sounds of words 
 When choosing a letter that is not in the word, an error sound will be heard. 
 
Level 
 Each language has 138 levels, separated into subject categories, you can reset the levels at any time, the 138 levels are loaded randomly. 
 
Progress 
 Each language has it own progress, if you change language the progress corresponding to the language will be loaded. 
 
Difficulty 
 There are three levels of difficulty (easy, medium and hard) for each word, if you get the word right the mistakes made. 
 With the easy level you can miss 6 times. 
 With the medium level you can miss 4 times. 
 With the hard level you can only miss 2 times.

The Memory Game is a classic game, memorizing the position of the pieces that are the same to find them. 
 In this game will be the words in a language and their translation to be found. 
 The pieces are put with the names down in random positions to be found, English words are in red squares and Portuguese words in green. 
 
Goal 
 The objective of the game is to get the word position and its translation right. 
 
Time 
 There is no time stamp but there is click markup. 
 
Sounds of words 
 Clicking on a square gives a sound effect. 
 
Level 
 There are 138 levels, separated into subject categories, you can reset at any time, the 138 levels are loaded randomly. 
 
Progress 
 Each language has it own progress, if you change language the progress corresponding to the language will be loaded.
